Even <S%G2531>as<s%> they <S%G3860>delivered<s%> them unto <S%G2254>us,<s%> which from the beginning <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G575><s%> <S%G746><s%> <S%G845>eyewitnesses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5257>ministers<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word;<s%>

It seemed <S%G1380>good<s%> to me <S%G2504>also,<s%> having had <S%G199>perfect<s%> <S%G3877>understanding<s%> of all <S%G3956>things<s%> from the very <S%G509>first,<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> in <S%G2517>order,<s%> most <S%G2903>excellent<s%> <S%G2321>Theophilus,<s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> thou mightest <S%G1921>know<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G803>certainty<s%> of those <S%G3056>things,<s%> <S%G4012>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> thou hast been <S%G2727>instructed.<s%>

There <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2197>Zacharias,<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2183>course<s%> of <S%G7>Abijah:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> was <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2364>daughters<s%> of <S%G2>Aaron,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G1665>Elisabeth.<s%>
